main event: A silvery, round object hovered near Mountain View, California, observed visually for about 1-2 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting involved one unusual spherical-shaped object,The witness reported visual surveillance of the object from the ground and air,Aircraft were in the vicinity at the time of the sighting,The object appeared metallic and disk-shaped,No running lights were observed on the object.
witness description: The object was observed from the ground and by aircraft.
